attributes.action: Do not extand the ultra low emission zone to the north and south circler
attributes.additional_details:
If you have a electric car you might think you are clean but you are far from it because the major pumping electric station will be polluting the air 

A point for everyone trees give us oxygen to breath the eat harmful gases 
But the government keeps cutting down the trees to build more houses and the complains about the air 
I would like to say by introduceing a 12:50 charge if you drive in the zones how is that going to get us clean air it is a scam that the mayor is bringing in
attributes.background:
The mayor of London thinks by extanding the ultra low emission zone to the north and south circler will produce clean air well he is wrong 
Years ago labour told the world diesels are the way forward and we should buy them now the are saying they are bad and we should go electric

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: 

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
